titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the use of public funds for political party conventions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Reported by the Committee on House Administration. H. Rept. 113-291.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 210.

bill.summary: 12/12/2013--Reported to House without amendment. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions providing for the use of funds from the Presidential Election Campaign Fund for presidential nominating conventions.
